Sentencas: The purpose of this study is the multiobjective optimization of the combination of photovoltaic (PV) panels, batteries (BAT), and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) according to different fuels for solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The most desirable hybrid system is the one that has the least cost, the least emission, and the most reliability.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: But, these objectives are in conflict with each other.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In order to obtain the optimum solutions (solutions are different in the number of PV panels, the number of batteries, and the power of SOFC), a multiobjective optimization evolutionary algorithm [Pareto envelope-based selection algorithm (PESA)] is used.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This work compares using different fuels as SOFC fuel in the hybrid system.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Results have been compared to specify the more favorable fuels for SOFC economically and ecologically.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Optimization is done for two categories of fuel price: international fuel prices and Iran fuel prices.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the sensitivity analysis of fuel price is considered.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The effect of change in SOFC power is examined to determine enough auxiliary power for this hybrid system.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: If the angle of panel can change monthly, PV panel productivity increases and the required SOFC power decreases, therefore the annualized cost and emission are reduced.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In the present work, the effect of the monthly change of the panel angle is considered.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Results show that the most appropriate fuel for SOFC in the hybrid system is natural gas.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It causes low annualized cost (ANC) and low CO2 emission.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: If the panel angle changes monthly, the solar energy utilization efficiency increases and panels produce more power and the hybrid system provides better economical and ecological conditions.
Titulo: Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
Multiobjective Optimization of PV-Bat-SOFC Hybrid System: Effect of Different Fuels Used in Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
